Mathematics Education (7-12).1: Make content knowledge accessible to students.
Mathematics Education (7-12).2: Create, implement and assess instructional and curricular goals.
Mathematics Education (7-12).3: Create and maintain a respectful and productive classroom learning environment.
Mathematics Education (7-12).5: Deliver instruction that is considerate of student development, diversity, and special needs.
Mathematics Education (7-12).6: Design experiences that address the content and processes in national and state mathematics standards.
Mathematics Education (7-12).7: Use students’ mathematical thinking productively to provide students with opportunities to develop both conceptual understanding and procedural fluency.
